title: General partner
context: ARTICLE 4. GENERAL PARTNERS [ยง425E-401] General partner. A person becomes a general partner: (1) As provided in the partnership agreement; (2) Under section 425E-801(3)(B) following the dissociation of a limited partnership&rsquo;s last general partner; (3) As the result of a conversion or merger under article 11; or (4) With the consent of all the partners. [L 2003, c 210, pt of ยง1]
